title: Wire awaiting state from ticks to TUI TaskInfo
description:
Update main.go refreshTasks() to pass awaiting state to TUI.

File: cmd/ticker/main.go (around lines 1100-1137)

Changes to refreshTasks():
1. In the TaskInfo creation loop, add Awaiting field from ticks.Task
2. Use t.GetAwaitingType() which handles backwards compat with Manual field

Before:
```go
taskInfos[i] = tui.TaskInfo{
    ID:        t.ID,
    Title:     t.Title,
    Status:    tui.TaskStatus(t.Status),
    BlockedBy: openBlockers,
}
```

After:
```go
taskInfos[i] = tui.TaskInfo{
    ID:        t.ID,
    Title:     t.Title,
    Status:    tui.TaskStatus(t.Status),
    BlockedBy: openBlockers,
    Awaiting:  t.GetAwaitingType(),  // NEW
}
```

Also update loadTasksForEpic() for parallel mode (around line 572) with same change.
